retrieval.indexer

Class RetrievalIndexerDistantStorage

  • java.lang.Object
    • retrieval.indexer.RetrievalIndexer
      • retrieval.indexer.RetrievalIndexerDistantStorage

  • public class RetrievalIndexerDistantStorage
extends RetrievalIndexer
    Retrieval indexer for a distant RetrievalServer (a server). A retrieval indexer can index, delete, get data on a RetrievalServer. The retrieval server must be a server (use host/port)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.lang.String storage
      RetrievalServer storage

                                     java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> properties)
                              throws java.io.IOException,
                                     NotValidMessageXMLException,
                                     CBIRException
        This function insert a picture on a CBIR storage
        Specified by:
        indexToStorage in class RetrievalIndexer
        Parameters:
        image - Image to index
        id - Resource id in server
        properties - Properties to store for the image
        Returns:
        Absolute file Path
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Cannot make a correct connection with server
        NotValidMessageXMLException - Bad message format
        CBIRException - Error from server

      • delete

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,CBIRException> delete(java.util.List<java.lang.Long> ids)
                                                   throws java.io.IOException,
                                                          NotValidMessageXMLException,
                                                          CBIRException
        This function delete a list of images on a storage. Images are just removed from results, but they are still in index. You need to run purge (VERY HEAVY OP!) when server will not be used (during night,...) to clean all index data.
        Specified by:
        delete in class RetrievalIndexer
        Parameters:
        ids - List of image id to delete
        Returns:
        Map with all deleted files
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Cannot make a correct connection with server
        NotValidMessageXMLException - Bad message format
        CBIRException - Error from server

                                                                                                   CBIRException

      • checkPictures

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,CBIRException> checkPictures(java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,CBIRException> ids)
                                                          throws java.io.IOException,
                                                                 NotValidMessageXMLException,
                                                                 CBIRException

        Specified by:
        checkPictures in class RetrievalIndexer
        Parameters:
        ids - List of image id to delete
        Returns:
        A map with picture list and their exception (NoException if picture is well indexed)

        CBIRException - Error from server
